description.narrative: This activity (TEACHNICAL Cooperation for MAHILA SAMAKHYA) is a component of MAHILA SAMAKHYA Education for Women's Equality Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £999,998. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: PwC India. The start date is 01-10-2007 and the end date is 30-09-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
